main event: On September 9, 1964, several people in Glassboro, New Jersey reported seeing a bright, multi-colored light in the sky that hovered for several minutes before rapidly accelerating and disappearing.
interesting points: The object was described as rapidly changing colors from red to white to green.
Some witnesses said the light seemed to hover in the sky for several minutes before suddenly shooting off at a high rate of speed.
Local police investigated the incident but were unable to identify the source of the light.
Investigators from Project Blue Book were dispatched to interview witnesses and examine the area, but the incident remains unexplained and is classified as 'unidentified'.
A separate incident on September 4, 1964 involving a homemade rocket launched by a teenager was also investigated, but found to be unrelated to the UFO sighting.
sighted object: a bright, multi-colored light in the sky
